name: Dragon Sword (Project D)
description: The company Hound 13, founded by former employees of Eyedentity Games, who released Dragon Nest, announced a new open-world role-playing game Dragon Sword (Project D), which is scheduled for release on mobile devices and PC. The game will be released on the Unreal Engine 5. The combat system in Project D is largely borrowed and refined from Hundred Soul. Familiar elements include battling and catching bosses, as well as several aerial moves and destroying super armor. Players will have to assemble unique characters and create teams with them. The main goal is to assemble a team with different synergies for different situations and terrains.
